review.p1: Before we begin, let’s take a moment to review what you committed to last time.
review.p2: This helps us encourage each other and see how God is at work.

para.1: Making real progress in our spiritual life rarely happens on our own. Across cultures, people have looked for a guide — someone with wisdom they can trust, who can show the way, challenge assumptions, and help others grow.
para.2: The explorations below invite you to see what Jesus taught his first disciples and how they learned from him. Gather with friends, watch, listen, and discover together whether he is a guru worth following.

jvideo.title: The Life of the Guru
jvideo.summary: Watch key moments from the life of Lord Jesus and see how his words and actions shaped the people who followed him — and why his influence continues today.

mountain.title: The Mountain of God
mountain.summary: Some say there are many paths to the top of the mountain. This short story invites you to consider how guides, paths, and destinations are connected.

wisemen.title: Birth of the Guru
wisemen.summary: Astrologers from the East notice a sign in the sky and set out on a long journey. Follow their search and discover why they believed a child born under this star was worth honoring.

life.title: His Teachings
life.summary: What did Lord Jesus teach his followers as they walked with him? Explore his words and stories and consider how they speak to everyday life.

ctc.title: His Holy Book
ctc.summary: Journey through the Holy Book to see how people across history searched for God, struggled, failed, and found hope along the way.

following.title: Following Him
following.summary: Watch friends discover who Lord Jesus is, how to talk with him in prayer, and how his way of life spreads naturally through relationships.

deepavali.title: Light for the Soul
deepavali.summary: During Deepavali, many reflect on light and hope. Explore how the light of Lord Jesus speaks into the heart with peace and freedom.

karma.title: Escaping Karma
karma.summary: Many long to escape the cycle of cause and effect. Discover how Lord Jesus offers forgiveness, restoration, and a new beginning.

ask.title: Ask a Question
ask.summary: Do you have questions about life, faith or God? You can share them here in a safe place and receive a personal reply from a real person.
